meta.description: Mapping of Polyhedral-Intelligence equation families to the Five-Field Maintenance Framework

chemical.description: Parameter families governing baseline constants and stability.

emotional.description: Response and bifurcation families defining sensitivity and harmonization.

cognitive.description: Coupling and synchronization families handling multi-observer coordination.

dream.description: Emergence and attractor families executing maintenance and synthesis.

symbolic.description: Encoding and projection families translating mathematics into glyphs and applied design.

coupling_logic: chemical → emotional → cognitive → dream → symbolic → feedback to chemical
